description: A functional and hardwearing padded vest with practical storage solutions that keep you organized while on the go. Two large, bellows pockets are positioned lower on the chest for ease of use. Includes an interior zippered chest pocket, a multitool pocket and two large hand pockets placed beneath the insulation layer so hands can stay warm in cold conditions. Press button closure at front. The relaxed fit means it can easily be worn over a sweater or a jacket for additional warmth.
name: Fjallraven Singi Padded Vest - Mens
